original_text: Breaking: Major infrastructure collapse reported in Mumbai due to heavy monsoon rains affecting thousands of residents
Urgent: Fake currency notes being distributed in Delhi markets - police advisory issued
Health Ministry confirms new vaccination drive in Karnataka starting next week
Alert: WhatsApp message claims free gold distribution in Tamil Nadu - government denies
Agricultural reforms announced for Punjab farmers with new subsidy schemes
Viral video shows alleged police brutality in West Bengal - investigation ordered
Cyclone warning issued for Odisha coast - evacuation procedures activated
False claim about water contamination in Gujarat industrial areas spreads on social media
Education policy changes announced for Rajasthan schools effective next academic year
Misleading information about Aadhaar data breach affects millions - UIDAI clarifies
Traditional festival celebrations in Kerala proceed with COVID protocols
Fake job recruitment scam targeting youth in Uttar Pradesh - police warning issued
Renewable energy project inaugurated in Haryana with international collaboration
Doctored images of flood damage in Assam circulate online during dry season
Medical college expansion approved for Madhya Pradesh with increased seat allocation
Conspiracy theory about 5G towers causing health issues spreads in Himachal Pradesh
Archaeological discovery in Chhattisgarh reveals ancient temple complex
False information about government scheme eligibility criteria confuses beneficiaries in Jharkhand
Wildlife conservation efforts show positive results in Uttarakhand national parks
Manipulated video of political rally in Manipur spreads false narrative about attendance
Infrastructure development project connects remote villages in Meghalaya
Misinformation about traditional medicine cures spreads in Mizoram communities
